entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is mentioned as the previous owner of the locket. The elf says 'This belonged to Regulus' indicating that it was his property.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as reacting to the locket with a comment saying 'Overkill, mate'. He is described as taking one look at the locket and letting out a howl of shock and misery.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as being overcome to be presented with a Black family heirloom. He is too weak at the knees to stand properly.
